response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $1,000,000 to you. We understand the importance of this investment to you and would like to extend an exclusive offer. For a limited time, we are offering this exceptional product at a special price of $950,000. This opportunity is designed to provide you with significant savings while ensuring you receive unparalleled value. We believe this is a fantastic chance for you to secure a high-quality asset at a competitive price. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact us. We look forward to the possibility of serving you soon.", "product_price": 950000}
